author: Microsoft
description:
In partnership with Microsoft India Development Center, CyberEYE created MahaCrimeOS AI, an AI-powered cybercrime investigation platform that guides Maharashtra police officers through step-by-step investigation pathways in natural language. With an 80% reduction in turnaround time, law enforcement officers can identify and stop threat actors more quickly than ever before with this investigation copilot. Read more about MahaCrimeOS AI: https://aka.ms/AAy4li4 

Subscribe to Microsoft on YouTube here: https://aka.ms/SubscribeToYouTube

title: MahaCrimeOS AI: accelerating cybercrime investigations with AI
